 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָטַף‎</span>] **verb** ==pluck off== (twigs, etc.), ==or out== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***pluck*** grapes; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְטַף‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡atâpu***</u></abbr>, ***apparently pluck off***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָטָ֑ף‎</span> [[Ezek.17.4|Ezek 17:4]] ***he*** [i.e. eagle, in figure] ***plucked off*** twigs; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְקָטַפְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Deut.23.26|Deut 23:26]] (ears of grain, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶקְטֹף‎</span> [[Ezek.17.22|Ezek 17:22]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; accusative +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> ***from***); ***Participle*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקֹּטְפִים‎</span> [[Job.30.4|Job 30:4]] ***they who pluck out*** the mallow. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָקָּטֵב‎</span> [[Job.8.12|Job 8:12]] ***it is not plucked off.***
